response.overview: The original form of this video was a 4 dimensional array of still images created by generatively editing together several brief abstract videos, so that every row/column of the tesseract is a nonrandom sequence. Since a regular motion picture can be described as a 1 dimensional array of stills, the original image could be called a video with 4 dimensions of time, or thousands of several second sequences. This video compresses and flattens that image into a single sequence by selecting frames in a helix shaped progression through the array.
response.title: Chromatic Fractures
